name: DP Energy Ireland Limited
goal: DP Energy is a renewable energy development company based in Co. Cork Ireland. The company aims to development projects which are sustainable and environmentally benign. We are operating mainly in the onshore and offshore wind, solar and marine energy sectors.
interests: Climate Action, Energy, Maritime affairs and fisheries
euInitiatives:
Renewable Energy - SET Plan
Innovation Fund, Innovfin
Maritime Affairs - Blue Growth
Energy Policy - General
Regional Development
Environment

DP Energy is interested in all EU initiatives and policies which impact on renewable energy developments.
